text: leda ila antaru: "Itane (muham'made) dinini kalpincadu." Varito ila anu: "Okavela nenu dinini kalpinci undinatlayite, miru nannu allah (siksa) nundi e matram kapadaleru. Miru kalpince matalu ayanaku baga telusu. Naku miku madhya ayana (allah) saksyame calu! Mariyu ayana ksamasiludu, apara karuna pradata
